title: Privacy Center
description: When you use our services, youâ€™re trusting us with your information. We understand this is a big responsibility and work hard to protect your information and put you in control.

consent.title: Manage your consent
consent.description: Manage your consent preferences, including the option to select 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information'.

consent_options.name: Data Sales or Sharing
consent_options.description: We may use some of your personal information for behavioral advertising purposes, which may be interpreted as 'Data Sales' or 'Data Sharing' under regulations such as CCPA, CPRA, VCDPA, etc.

consent_options.name: Email Marketing
consent_options.description: We may use some of your personal information to contact you about our products & services.

consent_options.name: Product Analytics
consent_options.description: We may use some of your personal information to collect analytics about how you use our products & services.
